page.title: 19 INDUSTRY
page.content: We have interveiwed Mr.Reed,the manager of Clee Hill Quarry.We found out that: The quarry is at least{100}to{150} years old.It covers{3/4}square mile. They quarry a stone called{Basalt.} They quarry{600}tons of it a day.They have{3}lorries called{Terex R 25}for carrying very heavy stone.The lorries can carry{25}tons.They also have{28} other lorries.They have{27}workmen (not including Mr.Reed.)Some workmen arrive at the quarry at{5.00a.m.}and some at{8.00 a.m. {4 years}ago a man had a nasty accident while mending a{conveyor {belt.}Somebody accidently switched the machine on and the belt cut his arm{ off.Gelignite was used for blasting. Now they use{Ammonium Nitrate}mixed with{diesel fuel.}They blast{1}or{2} days a week.Only{1}person is needed to
